Class DTD

  • java.lang.Object
    • DTD
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDTD

    public class DTD
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDTD
    determines the legal tags that can be used in the xml code and checks if the the tags are legal
    Version:
    1.00 2013-02-28
    Author:
    Patrick Hamod
